title: Metro Bundler: The React Native JavaScript Packager
author: jimarcey
content: readme.md metro-bundler javascript bundler react native. fast: aim sub-second reload cycles, fast startup quick bundling speeds. scalable: works thousands modules a single application. integrated: supports every react native project of box. project was previously part the react-native repository. this smaller repository is easier the team working metro bundler respond both issues pull requests. react-native#13976 the initial announcement.
